author: lcaug
title: To Rome with class... -
text:
Do you want to stay surrounded with class, roman history and discreet exclusively service?
Yep, you should stay here. This is a different hotel, is a different hotel experience, it’s an awesome experience. We felt being a part of a Woody Allen movie (one of the good ones) and enjoyed it so much.
Great location in the middle of this buzzy city, you can literally walk to everything. At the same time, quiet and peaceful.
The room we stayed in, standard room was beautiful, fantastic bathroom, most amazing wooden floor and so much more. Free minibar, how cleaver… we like.
If you are looking for a 5 – star modern + hotel with buzzy bars and loud music in the reception – this is not the place. Though, if you are looking for some light jazz, an historical experience, excellent breakfast and just something else we can thoroughly recommend it. Don’t forget the rooftop and some prosecco
Thank you Marco and Franco for great service, restaurant tips, tickets, conversations. You guys are awesome.
Cath / Lenn
